name: r4atlantis
body:
### Welcome to r4atlantis, home for R code developed by the Atlantis community

r4atlantis is meant to be your link to code for developing, executing, and comparing Atlantis models in R. We will provide forked copies of existing projects that are regularly updated and also host code directly.  We hope this space can also serve both as a launching spot for finding all the code others have written and as a common development area where new packages can be designed.  

### General organization set-up

If you have code you'd like to contribute or would like to join the group or a specific team, please contact @jsgosnell or @thefaylab

### Current packages and relation to Atlantis workflow

## Developing input files

**ratlantis **- functions to generate bgm file and run Atlantis from R console, gather data on species trait, interactions, and distribution from the cloud, suggest functional groupings, and generate the bio.prm file

## Tuning and visualization

**vat ** - code for shiny application to visualize Atlantis output

## Data processing

**atlantisom ** - functions to generate data sets from atlantis scenarios
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
